roleset.name: (cause to) become obscure or confused, or covered in mud
roleset.note: MUDDY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muddy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from muddy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: muddy-v: passive
example.text: [His `` Mr. Clean '' image]-1 was muddied [*-1]by an arms-kickback scandal , which [*T*-2] will be a major campaign issue .
example.arg: by an arms-kickback scandal , which [*T*-2] will be a major campaign issue

roleset.name: covered in mud, obscured
roleset.note: MUDDY-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: muddy-j
example.text: many were muddy with ancient humoral silt

example.name: muddy-j
example.text: Consequently , in Yellowstone National Park , new geysers erupted , and massive slumping caused large cracks in the ground , which emitted steam , and many hot springs became muddy .
